dct_description_sm: This point data layer represents private use airports in Wisconsin in 2018. The dataset was originally published by the Wisconsin Department of Transportation in 2018. This shapefile was originally part of a larger dataset of airport reference points. [Airport References Points (ARP) - An airport reference point (ARP) is the center point of an airport, located at the geometric center of all the usable runways. Buffer rings for each airport have been developed by WisDOT and are based on requirements outlined in the Wisconsin Highway Department's Facilities Development Manual.]
schema_provider_s: American Geographical Society Library – UWM Libraries
